properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT PHOTO_ID , PHOTO_NAME , PHOTO_PRICE , PHOTO_SRC FROM PHOTOS WHERE PHOTO_STATE = 0 AND PHOTO_SALE = 1 ORDER BY PHOTO_ID DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM PHOTOS WHERE PHOTO_STATE = 0 AND PHOTO_SALE = 1
